title: How do I maximize the battery life？
answer:
1、Press Power button to lock the screen when you do not use the phone.  
2、Set the screen timeout to the smallest value: Touch ![](http://consumer.huawei.com/resource/Image/0-111115114638.PNG)> Settings > Display > Screen timeout.  
3、Set the screen brightness to a lower degree: Touch ![](http://consumer.huawei.com/resource/Image/0-111115114649.PNG)> Settings > Display >Brightness.  
4、Turn off Bluetooth and Wi-Fi: Touch![](http://consumer.huawei.com/resource/Image/0-111115114658.PNG) > Settings > Wireless & networks and uncheck Wi-Fi and Bluetooth.  
5、Disable background data synchronization: Touch![](http://consumer.huawei.com/resource/Image/0-111115114712.PNG) > Settings > Accounts & sync and uncheck Background data and Auto-sync.  
6、Disable data service: Touch![](http://consumer.huawei.com/resource/Image/0-111115114724.PNG) > Settings > Wireless & networks > Mobile networks and uncheck Data enabled.  
7、Disable GPS: Touch![](http://consumer.huawei.com/resource/Image/0-111115114733.PNG) > Settings > Location & security and uncheck Use GPS satellites.  
8、Use only 2G networks: Touch ![](http://consumer.huawei.com/resource/Image/0-111115114741.PNG)> Settings > Wireless & networks > Mobile networks and uncheck Use only 2G networks.  
Notes：  
Standby time：380 hours (WCDMA)  
Talking time：4.5 hours (WCDMA)  
Charging Time：About 4 hours
